verses.name: Psalms 139:1
verses.text: O Lord, thou hast searched me, and known me.

verses.name: Psalms 139:2
verses.text: Thou knowest my downsitting and mine uprising, thou understandest my thought afar off.

verses.name: Psalms 139:3
verses.text: Thou compassest my path and my lying down, and art acquainted with all my ways.

verses.name: Psalms 139:4
verses.text: For there is not a word in my tongue, but, lo, O Lord, thou knowest it altogether.

verses.name: Psalms 139:5
verses.text: Thou hast beset me behind and before, and laid thine hand upon me.

verses.name: Psalms 139:6
verses.text: Such knowledge is too wonderful for me; it is high, I cannot attain unto it.

verses.name: Psalms 139:7
verses.text: Whither shall I go from thy spirit? or whither shall I flee from thy presence?
